name: DetachBlogTagFromLanguageGroup
description:
Detach a Blog Tag from a multi-language group.

Use this tool to remove a blog tag from its association with a multi-language group in HubSpot CMS. This can be useful when restructuring tags or changing their multi-language settings.

parameters.name: blog_tag_id
parameters.description: ID of the blog tag to remove from a multi-language group in HubSpot CMS.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to remove from a multi-language group.
